attributes.action: Respect Jewish cultural and religious right of killing animals without stunning
attributes.additional_details:
It is unjust and unfair and inhuman to discriminate against a minority community where that community has religious and cultural obligations that it has no choice but to respect as it believes that it is a command of God. Other communities should respect that and defend the minority communities as this would strenthen society and bring it immense benefit and not fall to the prejudice of other misguided or prejudiced minorities or even majorities. There are a lot of vocal groups who have enormous power that even the Queen warned us of evil forces in operation in this country against which we must stand in unity It is incumbent on the government or the media not to carry out hidden agendas against any community either.

The government should legislate so that such attacks against the religious rights and obligations of minorities does not become a political football or encourage racial or religious discrimination against minorities.
